name: Spooks (itch) (TransGame668)
description:
It is dark when you start it. Perhaps you wanna play it. This game is probably the scariest game that i make, so if you get spooked easily, do not play. You get thirsty and are out of red soda can, so you go into the forest to find some. Red soda can is located in the 5 places. Just collect 6 red soda can to continue. But first, find the message number start from 1-5. If you wrong entering, the place you visit makes easily forget it. Each red soda can has a portal cube for back to the start point, but the item you collect still safe.

If you finish collecting them, there a 2 scene where you can read it or skip it. after that you will be navigate to the scary maze. but you won't stuck if you follow the tree components and finally find the "END??" Block.

Controls: WSAD is move, MOUSE is look, & SPACE is jump.
